projects.name: Smart Blind stick System
projects.description: Developed a robust, smart IOT sensors embedded stick system for blind people. It uses tech like Computer vision to detect hurdles and alert the person. It uses sensors and computer vision to detect hurdles and alerts the person through sound and vibrations.
